1. Based on the extracted data from {'Course Information': {'Course Title': 'Github Foundations Certification Training', 'Name of Organisation': 'Tertiary Infotech Pte Ltd', 'Classroom Hours': 7, 'Number of Assessment Hours': 2, 'Course Duration (Number of Hours)': 16, 'Industry': 'Infocomm Technology'}, 'Learning Outcomes': {'Learning Outcomes': ['LO1: Analyze Github components and coordinate release scheduling with collaborators to align processes.', 'LO2: Select appropriate Git scripts for integrating and deploying software products.', 'LO3: Configure software products and deploy releases using Git configuration tests.', 'LO4: Diagnose issues identified during Github configuration testing by interpreting configuration test results.', 'LO5: Identify potential improvements to the software configuration, deployment processes, and code elements.', 'LO6: Implement modifications to software products and processes for improved functionality.'], 'Knowledge': ['K1: Types and usage of scripts and tools for integrating and deploying software products', 'K2: Software configuration procedures', 'K3: Configuration tests and their purposes', 'K4: Interpretation of configuration test results', 'K5: Elements of the software configuration and deployment process'], 'Ability': ['A1: Analyse release components', 'A2: Coordinate with relevant stakeholders on release scheduling to align release processes and procedures', 'A3: Select appropriate scripts and tools for integrating and deploying software products', 'A4: Configure software products to integrate and deploy software releases to various platforms', 'A5: Execute configuration tests on platform specific versions of software products in line with testing procedures', 'A6: Diagnose issues surfaced from configuration testing', 'A7: Identify potential improvements and modifications to the software configuration and deployment process or the software code', 'A8: Implement modifications to platform-specific software products and processes'], 'Knowledge and Ability Mapping': {'KA1': ['A1', 'A2'], 'KA2': ['K1', 'A3'], 'KA3': ['K2', 'K3', 'A4', 'A5'], 'KA4': ['K4', 'A6'], 'KA5': ['K5', 'A7'], 'KA6': ['A8']}}, 'TSC and Topics': {'TSC Title': ['Software Configuration'], 'TSC Code': ['ICT-DIT-3014-1.1'], 'Topics': ['Topic 1: Introduction to Git and GitHub (A1, A2)', 'Topic 2: Working with GitHub Repository (K1, A3)', 'Topic 3: Collaboration Features (K2, K3, A4, A5)', 'Topic 4: Modern Development (K4, A6)', 'Topic 5: GitHub Project (K5, A7)', 'Topic 6: Privacy, Security and Administration (A8)'], 'Learning Units': ['LU1: Git and GitHub Fundamentals', 'LU2: GitHub Repository Management', 'LU3: Collaborative Workflows on GitHub', 'LU4: Modern GitHub Development Practices', 'LU5: GitHub Project Automation', 'LU6: GitHub Security and Administration']}, 'Assessment Methods': {'Assessment Methods': ['Written Assessment', 'Practical Performance'], 'Amount of Practice Hours': '7 hrs', 'Course Outline': {'Learning Units': {'LU1': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 1: Introduction to Git and GitHub (A1, A2)', 'Details': ['What is version control', 'Basic Git commands', 'What is GitHub?', 'Components of the GitHub flow', 'GitHub is a collaborative platform', 'GitHub platform management']}]}, 'LU2': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 2: Working with GitHub Repository (K1, A3)', 'Details': ['Repository management', 'Create a new GitHub Repository', 'Clone a repository', 'Create a new branch', 'Add files to a repository', 'Manage repository changes by using pull requests on GitHub', 'View repository insights']}]}, 'LU3': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 3: Collaboration Features (K2, K3, A4, A5)', 'Details': ['Managing issues and discussions', 'Forking and pull requests', 'GitHub pages', 'Markdown Features', 'Link a PR to an Issue', 'Identify how to assign Issues.', 'Code reviews']}]}, 'LU4': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 4: Modern Development (K4, A6)', 'Details': ['GitHub Actions', 'GitHub Copilot', 'GitHub Codespaces']}]}, 'LU5': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 5: GitHub Project (K5, A7)', 'Details': ['Projects versus Projects Classic', 'How to create a project', 'How to organize your project', 'How to organize and automate your project', 'Insight and automation with projects']}]}, 'LU6': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 6: Privacy, Security and Administration (A8)', 'Details': ['Introduction to GitHub administration', 'Authenticate and authorize user identities on GitHub', 'Dependency management', 'Code scanning', 'Secret scanning', 'How to maintain a secure GitHub repository', 'Automated security', 'InnerSouce']}]}}}, 'Instructional Methods': 'Classroom, Didactic Questioning, Demonstration, Practical'}}, generate your justifications.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.

```json
{
  "Performance Gaps": [
    "Learners struggle/are unclear with analyzing individual GitHub components and their interactions within complex workflows.
Attributes gained:
Ability to comprehensively analyze GitHub components and coordinate release schedules effectively, ensuring streamlined processes.
Post training benefits:
Improved collaboration and alignment of release processes, leading to faster and more reliable software releases.",
    "Learners struggle/are unclear with selecting and customizing Git scripts for different software integration and deployment scenarios.
Attributes gained:
Proficiency in selecting and applying appropriate Git scripts for seamless integration and deployment of software products.
Post training benefits:
Reduced deployment errors and improved efficiency in integrating software components, resulting in quicker time to market.",
    "Learners struggle/are unclear with configuring software products using Git configuration tests and understanding the implications of test failures.
Attributes gained:
Ability to confidently configure software products and execute Git configuration tests to ensure deployment readiness.
Post training benefits:
Enhanced software stability and reduced post-deployment issues, leading to improved user satisfaction.",
    "Learners struggle/are unclear with diagnosing complex issues from GitHub configuration testing results due to insufficient knowledge of error patterns.
Attributes gained:
Proficiency in diagnosing and resolving issues identified during GitHub configuration testing by accurately interpreting test results.
Post training benefits:
Faster identification and resolution of software defects, minimizing downtime and improving overall system reliability.",
    "Learners struggle/are unclear with identifying areas for improvement in existing software configurations and deployment processes to enhance efficiency.
Attributes gained:
Ability to critically assess software configurations and deployment processes to identify potential improvements and optimizations.
Post training benefits:
Streamlined deployment processes and reduced operational costs through optimized software configurations."
  ]
}
```
